data.name: Andre
data.title: Fullstack Software Engineer | Cloud-Native & AI-Powered Systems
data.summary: Hey! Iâ€™m a Fullstack Software Engineer who turns complex ideas into fast, reliable, and intelligent web applications. I work across the stack â€” from building cloud-native backends and AI-powered features to crafting responsive, user-friendly interfaces. Iâ€™m especially passionate about real-time systems, DevOps workflows, and delivering solutions that create real impact. Driven by curiosity and creativity, Iâ€™m always learning, always building â€” and always focused on bridging technology with meaningful user experiences.

projects.title: TransparAI
projects.purpose: An AI platform for analyzing complex legal and technical documents, with secure authentication and subscriptions.
projects.impact: Empowers users with AI-driven summaries, improving decision-making in legal fields. Features secure auth, subscriptions, and PDF export.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, built the UI, integrated the Gemini AI API, and implemented secure auth and subscriptions.

projects.title: PlatformPro Jobs
projects.purpose: A job board for platform engineers with AI-powered candidate scoring and job description generation.
projects.impact: Streamlines hiring for platform roles with AI tools for recruiters and a dedicated dashboard for candidates, boosting efficiency.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, architected the app, implemented Firebase services, and integrated Genkit for AI features.
features: Stripe integration for job posting credits

projects.title: Freemap
projects.purpose: A platform to connect users by location and facilitate real-time video calls, enabling profile discovery and direct interaction.
projects.impact: Facilitates community building by combining location-based discovery with real-time video, enabling diverse user connections.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, responsible for the Node.js backend, real-time communication, React frontend, and user authentication.

projects.title: Digital Starter
projects.purpose: A web application for structured digital learning or onboarding, guiding users through phases with AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.impact: Streamlines user onboarding with a clear, multi-phase journey, enhancing engagement through AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.role: This is a description of the project itself, not a specific role within its development.

workExperience.title: IT Support & Python Development (Apprentice)
workExperience.subtitle: HDI France, Paris
workExperience.description:
• Provided Level 1 & 2 technical support, managing user incidents for hardware, network, and software issues via GLPI.
  • Modernized and maintained legacy Python scripts, focusing on performance optimization, bug fixes, and code readability.
  • Developed automation scripts to streamline document exports, improving data accessibility and workflow efficiency.
  • Managed the IT asset lifecycle, including deployment, configuration, and network administration for user workstations and meeting room hardware (ClickShare).

workExperience.title: Developer (Intern)
workExperience.subtitle: FEDHUBS, Remote
workExperience.description:
• Developed a web scraping algorithm using Python (BeautifulSoup) to extract and structure data, complemented by a simple web interface.
  • Enhanced website SEO and performance using Laravel and React with TypeScript, optimizing loading, compressing resources, and refining meta tags for better search ranking.
